Package com.epitech.neerbyy

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildConfig  
    CreateAccount
    This class represent the view for create a new user account.
    EditInfoUser
    This class stock temporary the informations of the user.
    Geoloc
    Just an temporary DEBUG class
    GetUserById
    This class can ask to the WebService the informations about one user by an Id user.
    Login
    This class represent the view for logging an user.
    MainMenu
    This class describe the temporary menu of each views All views extend this class instead the class Activity
    Map
    This is an temporary debugging test class
    MapView
    This class represent the view of the Google Map view.
    MyGeoloc
    Just an temporary DEBUG class
    MyRegex
    This class allow to check all the user's Input, and check the syntax with a predefine pattern.
    Network
    Network is a static a class for performing network tasks.
    Place
    This class represent the list of places send by the WebService
    Post
    This class represent the list of post send by the WebService.
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.integer  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    ResponseWS
    ResponseWs represent a generic object type that return the WebService for each request.
    ThreadPlaces
    this class can launch a request for Places around the user.
    ThreadUpdatePost
    This class can launch a request for obtain list of posts from a given place.
    User
    This class represent data of one user register in Neerbyy.
    ViewPost
    This class represent the view associate to a place, and allow to list all posts of this place.
